sqlMap.select:
select count(e.dict_type_id) from cms.cms_tb_dict_type e where e.dict_type_state ='U'
e.dict_type_name like #dictTypeName,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
e.dict_type_value like #dictTypeValue,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
e.remark like #remark,handler=wildcard# escape '\'

select e.dict_type_id as dictTypeId, e.parent_dict_type_id as parentDictTypeId , e.dict_type_name as dictTypeName, e.dict_type_value as dictTypeValue, e.remark as remark, e.dict_type_state as dictTypeState, e.last_modify as lastModify, e.modify_date as modifyDate from cms.cms_tb_dict_type e where e.dict_type_state ='U'
e.dict_type_name like #dictTypeName,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
e.dict_type_value like #dictTypeValue,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
e.remark like #remark,handler=wildcard# escape '\'

select e.dict_type_id as dictTypeId, e.parent_dict_type_id as parentDictTypeId , e.dict_type_name as dictTypeName, e.dict_type_value as dictTypeValue, e.remark as remark, e.dict_type_state as dictTypeState, e.last_modify as lastModify, e.modify_date as modifyDate from cms.cms_tb_dict_type e where e.dict_type_state ='U'
e.dict_type_id=#dictTypeId#
e.dict_type_value=#dictTypeValue#

select e.item_id as itemId , e.dict_type_id as dictTypeId, e.parent_item_id as parentItemId, e.item_name as itemName, e.item_description as itemDescription, e.item_value as itemValue, e.remark as remark, e.item_state as itemState, e.last_modify as lastModify, e.charge_id as chargeId, e.appobject_level as appobjectLevel, e.modify_date as modifyDate from cms.cms_tb_dict e where e.item_state='U'
e.item_id = #itemId#

select count(e.item_id) from cms.cms_tb_dict e where e.item_state ='U'
e.dict_type_id = #dictTypeId#
e.item_id = #itemId#

select e.item_id as itemId , e.dict_type_id as dictTypeId, e.parent_item_id as parentItemId, e.item_name as itemName, e.item_description as itemDescription, e.item_value as itemValue, e.remark as remark, e.item_state as itemState, e.last_modify as lastModify, e.charge_id as chargeId, e.appobject_level as appobjectLevel, e.modify_date as modifyDate from cms.cms_tb_dict e where e.item_state='U'
e.dict_type_id = #dictTypeId#
e.item_id = #itemId#
e.item_Name = #itemName#

select count(1) from cms.cms_tb_dict t, cms.cms_tb_dict_type p where t.dict_type_id = p.dict_type_id
p.dict_type_value = #dictTypeValue#

select t.item_id as itemId, t.dict_type_id as dictTypeId, t.parent_item_id as parentItemId, t.item_name as itemName, t.item_description as itemDescription, t.item_value as itemValue, t.remark as remark, t.item_state as itemState, t.last_modify as lastModify, t.charge_id as chargeId, t.appobject_level as appobjectLevel, t.modify_date as modifyDate from cms.cms_tb_dict t, cms.cms_tb_dict_type p where t.dict_type_id = p.dict_type_id
p.dict_type_value = #dictTypeValue#
order by t.item_id desc
sqlMap.insert:
select CMS.CMS_SQ_DICT_TYPE.NEXTVAL as dictTypeId from dual
insert into CMS.CMS_TB_DICT_TYPE (DICT_TYPE_ID, PARENT_DICT_TYPE_ID, DICT_TYPE_NAME, DICT_TYPE_VALUE, REMARK, DICT_TYPE_STATE, LAST_MODIFY, MODIFY_DATE ) values (#dictTypeId:NUMBER#, #dictTypeId:NUMBER#, #dictTypeName:VARCHAR#, #dictTypeValue:VARCHAR#, #remark:VARCHAR#, 'U', sysdate, sysdate )

select CMS.CMS_SQ_DICT.NEXTVAL as itemId from dual
insert into CMS.CMS_TB_DICT (ITEM_ID, DICT_TYPE_ID, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_DESCRIPTION, ITEM_VALUE, REMARK, ITEM_STATE, LAST_MODIFY, MODIFY_DATE ) values (#itemId:NUMBER#, #dictTypeId:NUMBER#,
#itemName:VARCHAR#, #itemDescription:VARCHAR#, #itemValue:VARCHAR#, #remark:VARCHAR#, 'U', sysdate, sysdate )
sqlMap.update:
update CMS.CMS_TB_DICT t set t.LAST_MODIFY=sysdate
t.ITEM_NAME =#itemName#
t.ITEM_VALUE =#itemValue#
t.ITEM_DESCRIPTION =#itemDescription#
t.REMARK =#remark#
t.ITEM_STATE =#itemState#
where t.ITEM_ID=#itemId#

update CMS.CMS_TB_DICT_TYPE t set t.LAST_MODIFY=sysdate
t.DICT_TYPE_NAME =#dictTypeName#
t.DICT_TYPE_VALUE =#dictTypeValue#
t.DICT_TYPE_STATE =#dictTypeState#
t.REMARK =#remark#
where t.DICT_TYPE_ID=#dictTypeId#
sqlMap.select:
select e.item_id as itemId , e.dict_type_id as dictTypeId, e.parent_item_id as parentItemId, e.item_name as itemName, e.item_description as itemDescription, e.item_value as itemValue, e.remark as remark, e.item_state as itemState, e.last_modify as lastModify, e.charge_id as chargeId, e.appobject_level as appobjectLevel, e.modify_date as modifyDate from cms.cms_tb_dict e where e.item_state='U'
e.dict_type_id = #dictTypeId#
